product.name: Reiss Harper Dress - Tailored Dress in Black, Womens, Size 0

description.short: Adding a polished, pulled-together element to any look, the Harper dress is a workwear classic. Exceptionally tailored to a slim-fitting silhouette and falling to the knee, it features a V neckline and capped sleeves to create a universally flattering shape. Fabricated in a defined twill with a lustrous finish, the wrap-front design nips in at the waist to create a feminine, contemporary silhouette. Effortlessly formal when paired with the coordinating Harper blazer, just add heels for
description.long: Adding a polished, pulled-together element to any look, the Harper dress is a workwear classic. Exceptionally tailored to a slim-fitting silhouette and falling to the knee, it features a V neckline and capped sleeves to create a universally flattering shape. Fabricated in a defined twill with a lustrous finish, the wrap-front design nips in at the waist to create a feminine, contemporary silhouette. Effortlessly formal when paired with the coordinating Harper blazer, just add heels for a refined boardroom-ready look. * New and contemporary styling * Defined twill fabrication * Comfort stretch * V neckline * Nipped-in waist * Slim-fit silhouette * Knee length * Fully lined. Ways to wear: * Dressed up for evening occasions * Wear with matching separates for the office

product.name: Reiss Barolo - Wool Modern Fit Suit in Taupe, Mens, Size 36

description.short: Designed in London, add razor-sharp style to your wardrobe courtesy of the Barolo blazer and trousers in taupe. Wear them as a set or pair individually with casual pieces. Jacket: * Modern fit * Single breasted * Peak lapels * Single button fastening * Buttoned sleeve cuffs * Double vent to reverse. Trousers: * Modern fit * Twin slash pockets to front * Belt loops * Zip fly. All suit trousers come in size relation to the jacket. They feature an adjustable widt
description.long: Designed in London, add razor-sharp style to your wardrobe courtesy of the Barolo blazer and trousers in taupe. Wear them as a set or pair individually with casual pieces. Jacket: * Modern fit * Single breasted * Peak lapels * Single button fastening * Buttoned sleeve cuffs * Double vent to reverse. Trousers: * Modern fit * Twin slash pockets to front * Belt loops * Zip fly. All suit trousers come in size relation to the jacket. They feature an adjustable width through the waist and leg, come in one length with an unfinished hem and can be tailored to a maximum length of 36". To ensure every Reiss garment is the perfect fit for you please refer to our size guide and check our measurement
